dc_title_s: Survey Mississippi Fortifications from Port Hudson to Bayou Sara
dc_description_s: 1 map : hand col. ; 35 x 23 cm.|Pages 217-218 of the April 4, 1863 issue of Harper's Weekly.|Ill. on verso: A night scout in the southwest - surprise of an outpost, and survey of the rebel guns.|Map shows fortifications, land surveys, landowners, roads, and railroads for the vicinity of parishes of east and west Baton Rouge and West Feliciana along the Mississippi River.|Relief shown by hachures.
